chapter.title: Display an informational message
chapter.simpara: This allows the administrator to display an informational message to all users, connected or about to connect. For instance, to plan a maintenance operation.
Access this function using the "Set default informational message" link.
The entered message now appears on top of every page (including the home page), to all users.

note.para: The informational message is not persistent: it is reset if you restart the web application.
